mapper.delete: delete from t_commodityAd where 1=1 and commodityAdId = #{commodityAdId}
mapper.select: SELECT commodityAdId,a.categoryId categoryId,a.`type` `type`,commodityAdName,commodityAdImg,com.commodityId, com.commodityName commodityName,a.sort sort,a.status status FROM t_commodityAd a LEFT JOIN t_category c ON c.`categoryId`=a.categoryId LEFT JOIN t_commodity com ON com.commodityId=a.commodityId WHERE commodityAdId=#{0}

SELECT categoryName,a.commodityAdName,commodityAdId,a.createTime,a.status,a.`type` `type` FROM t_commodityAd a LEFT JOIN t_commodity b ON a.commodityId=b.commodityId LEFT JOIN t_category c ON c.`categoryId`=a.categoryId WHERE 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND a.type = #{relationMap.type}
AND a.status = #{relationMap.status}
AND ( a.commodityAdName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') )
order by a.createTime desc
mapper.update:
update t_commodityAd
commodityAdName = #{commodityAdName},
commodityAdImg = #{commodityAdImg},
commodityId = #{commodityId},
url = #{url},
type = #{type},
status = #{status},
commodityDes = #{commodityDes},
categoryId = #{categoryId},
sort = #{sort},
updateTime = #{updateTime}
where commodityAdId = #{commodityAdId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_commodityAd ( commodityAdId, commodityAdName, commodityAdImg, commodityId, url, type, categoryId, createTime, status, commodityDes, sort )values(#{commodityAdId}, #{commodityAdName}, #{commodityAdImg}, #{commodityId}, #{url}, #{type}, #{categoryId}, sysdate(), #{status}, #{commodityDes}, #{sort} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_category c WHERE c.status=1 AND c.parentId="0" AND c.type = "FL" ORDER BY c.sort

SELECT DISTINCT(c.commodityId) commodityId,c.commodityName commodityName FROM t_commodity c LEFT JOIN t_commodityAd a ON a.commodityId=c.commodityId LEFT JOIN t_category ca ON ca.categoryId=a.categoryId WHERE c.categoryId IN (SELECT categoryId FROM t_category WHERE parentId=#{0})

SELECT DISTINCT(c.commodityId) commodityId,c.commodityName commodityName FROM t_commodity c LEFT JOIN t_category ca ON c.categoryId=ca.categoryId WHERE ca.parentId = (SELECT t_category.categoryId FROM t_category LEFT JOIN t_commodityAd ON t_commodityAd.categoryId=t_category.categoryId WHERE t_commodityAd.commodityAdId=#{0} )
